originalText.text:
I gave this place a second try. I must admit they are pretty good with threading eyebrows but NOT EYE LASHES !

The lady is rough by stretching your your eyelid up to the point when you try to look down ‚Äúas they advise when applying lashes‚Äù your bottom eye skin covers your site. I thought I can just handle it, maybe this was her personal great technique‚Ä¶ and I was wrong‚Ä¶

She applied the lashes below your natural lashes! I thought the glue needed to dry, my eye was very teary‚Ä¶ I stood at the salon until my eye stop teary.

These lashes were placed at 11:30am it is now 5:39pm and every time I close my left eye, my eye feels extremely irritated! I feel I need to remove these very soon (tonight). My eye is starting to swell!

Wouldn‚Äôt advise you to attend this salon for lash extensions application.

originalText.text: Nimi serviced me. She was great. You bring the whole place to life. I am a very hard person to please and NiMi passed my expectations. She only works on Sunday. Book with her

originalText.text: My new wax place! Eti(pronounced e-t) is amazing with waxing and brows. Great prices and friendly ladies on staff. Yes, the wax rooms do need renovating but they're kept clean.

originalText.text: My niece came here and the lady don‚Äôt have hard wax for Brazilian so she used soft and they lady with glasses didn‚Äôt trim it when I specifically requested it and my niece ended up bleeding. Horrible should not be in business. Just want the money.
